A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The problem with this new set of Star Wars movies is that I just don't care about any of the characters at all. Poe Dameron has to be the least complex major character in a movie in history. Rey and Finn are also suitably bland and no one has an interesting story. This movie also swerved into the big mistake of the prequels: too much CGI. The scenes on the casino planet are basically just a cartoon. Do they live? Do they die? Frankly\, I couldn't care less.
